statements: SELECT * FROM email_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT email_subject, email_content FROM email_sequences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, trigger_event, send_timing FROM email_sequences WHERE is_sent = TRUE;
SELECT sequence_id, email_subject FROM email_sequences WHERE trigger_event = 'Order Confirmation';
SELECT sequence_id, email_subject, is_sent FROM email_sequences WHERE send_timing > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_sequences WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY send_timing DESC;
SELECT email_subject, email_content FROM email_sequences WHERE trigger_event = 'Welcome' AND is_sent = FALSE;
SELECT sequence_id, email_subject FROM email_sequences WHERE email_subject LIKE '%discount%' ORDER BY sequence_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM email_sequences WHERE is_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM email_sequences WHERE sequence_id BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY email_subject ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email='example@gmail.com';
SELECT email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(sequence_id) AS email_count FROM users LEFT JOIN email_sequences ON users.user_id = email_sequences.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM email_sequences WHERE trigger_event='new_user_registration' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trigger_event, email_subject FROM email_sequences ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(sequence_id) AS total_emails_sent FROM email_sequences GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_emails_sent > 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, signup_date FROM users ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, email_subject, sent_date FROM emails WHERE opened = FALSE;
SELECT trigger_id, trigger_type, trigger_date FROM email_triggers WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT email_subject, sent_date FROM emails WHERE email_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, trigger_type FROM email_triggers WHERE trigger_date < '2022-01-01' AND trigger_id > 50;

SELECT u.user_id, e.email_subject, et.trigger_type FROM users u INNER JOIN emails e ON u.user_id = e.user_id INNER JOIN email_triggers et ON u.user_id = et.user_id WHERE e.opened = FALSE ORDER BY e.sent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM welcome_emails;
SELECT user_id, subject FROM follow_up_emails WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, reminder_text, reminder_sent FROM abandoned_cart_reminders WHERE product_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT subject, body FROM welcome_emails WHERE sent_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM welcome_emails;
SELECT user_id, subject, sent_at FROM welcome_emails WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, body FROM abandoned_cart_reminders ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, subject, body FROM follow_up_emails WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM welcome_emails;
SELECT id, email_content FROM abandoned_cart_reminders WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT sent_at, email_content FROM followup_emails ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login';
SELECT recipient_email FROM email_logs WHERE sent_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM welcome_emails ORDER BY sent_at DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, email_content FROM followup_emails WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT id, user_id, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login'
SELECT id, cart_items FROM abandoned_cart_reminders WHERE JSON_LENGTH(cart_items) > 0
SELECT * FROM email_logs WHERE sent_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-07-01' ORDER BY sent_at DESC
